name: Bank Robbery Secret Agent
description:
Get ready for an ultimate action. As a special secret agent of agency, steel documents form the bank vault which are important for national security. Being a famous secret spy of secret service agency & authorities don’t have any doubts on your abilities. Secret agency has hired you for this high level secret mission that involves stealth killing, dodging security cameras, reach the hidden Vault and do not get killed or caught.

Playing secret agent spy game bank robbery stay in a stealth mode to hide yourself from the enemies & security cameras. Shoot bank security guards to complete mission. Just get started using your elite sneaky skills to reach the vault and steal important documents. Save your country playing secret agent mission game. Enjoy one of the best secret spy games in bank job.

Features
5 secret agent missions
Realistic bank environment
Challenging real spy mission
Real time lock picking & door hacking game play
Spy Gadgets silenced weapons, night vision
A.I based bank guard’s
Intuitive FPS and 3rd Person Controls

Download secret agent spy game, live life of spy agent with secret mission.
